subdisciplines.name: Scenic Design
subdisciplines.description: The creation of theatrical scenery, including research, concept development, drafting, and model-building.

subdisciplines.name: Lighting Design
subdisciplines.description: The creation of theatrical lighting effects, including research, planning, and execution.

subdisciplines.name: Costume Design
subdisciplines.description: The creation of theatrical costumes, including research, sketching, pattern-making, and construction.

subdisciplines.name: Sound Design
subdisciplines.description: The creation of soundscapes for theatrical productions, including research, recording, editing, and mixing.

subdisciplines.name: Stage Management
subdisciplines.description: The coordination and management of all technical aspects of a theatrical production, including scheduling, budgeting, and communication.
